content: technique skip to the next step ● now knit 1 round where you change the needles from 40cm cable to 80cm cable your needles should now be parallel to each other and have the same number of stitches you re now ready to knit the 3-needle bind-off ● turn your work inside out so the purl side is towards you ● the bottom of the bag is knit together using the 3needle bind off technique makeup brush purse ● cast on 38 48 sts on 4 mm us6 dpn s or an 80 cm 32 inches circular needle ● distribute the sts evenly between the two ends of the circular needle so you can work in the round if you are doing magic loop ● join to knit in the round and work in stockinette stitch until the work measures 19 21 cm 7 4 8 2 inches from the cast-on edge if you re already using the magic loop technique skip to the next step ● now knit 1 round where you change the needles from dpn s to80cm cable your needles should now be parallel toeach other and have the samenumber of stitches you re now ready to knit the 3-needle bind off ● turn your work inside out so the purl side is towards you ● the bottom of the purse is knit together using the 3 needle bind off technique to go pouch ● cast on 28 36 50 sts on 4 mm us6 dpn s or an 80 cm 32 inches circular needle ● distribute the sts evenly between the two ends of the circular needle so you can work in the round if you are doing magic loop ● join to knit in the round and work in stockinette stitch until the work measures 10 14 9 5 cm 4 5 5 3 7 inches from the cast-on edge if you re already using the magic loop technique skip to the next step ● now knit 1 round where you change the needles from dpn s to80cm cable your needles should now be parallel toeach other and have the samenumber of stitches you re now ready to knit the 3-needle bind off ● turn your work inside out so the purl side is towards you ● the bottom of the pouch is knit together using the 3 needle bind off technique
